about_the_game: This game leads players into an ancient city brimming with mystery and historical charm, featuring a classically exquisite art style that exudes a rich sense of history through every brick and tile. Players assume the role of a brave explorer tasked with finding food necessary for survival within this ancient city. By using the ASDW keys to control the character's movements and the space bar for jumping, players must follow in-game prompts to overcome various obstacles and uncover hidden secrets. The background music is melodious and enigmatic, complemented by meticulously detailed sound effects, from footfalls to environmental noises, greatly enhancing the game's immersive quality. Whether you have a passion for history or enjoy adventure and puzzle-solving, this game promises an unforgettable journey.

name: Juxtaposition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
